description:
Players will be able to use the Three Musketeers Suits for the following 3 characters: Izuku Midoriya, Katsuki Bakugo, and Shoto Todoroki.
This pack also includes 10 color variations for each outfit.

Contents:
- Three Musketeers Suits for Izuku Midoriya, Katsuki Bakugo, and Shoto Todoroki
- 10 outfit Color Variations for each Three Musketeers Suit

*Please be aware that the DLC has limited availability and may become unavailable without notice.
name: MY HERO ONE'S JUSTICE 2 Three Musketeers Set
